subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Question for all "Frank's ghostbox" owners
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Well I got a voice from #22 that says "Where's that Bill-------He doesn't 
Live here".

Frank-S


>From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Question for all "Frank's ghostbox" owners
>Date: Fri, 6 Jul 2007 20:44:42 -0700 (PDT)
>
>Bill said something that had me thinking. He mentioned that when he first 
>got his box it called Franks name repeatedly. That isnt the first time I 
>saw someone say that. I know quite a few of you now have been given a box 
>or even constructed your own versions like Steve based on the work Frank 
>did.
>
>   I have heard a couple of peoples results here but I would like to hear 
>more so I am going to ask if you have one you comment on your use of it and 
>how you think the results went as well as maybe post a few sound files that 
>I can hear. I have spent years listening to the box voices but its 
>refreshing to hear others results and see the variations as with any other 
>evp method, it differs by user/location. LOL you know who you are and I 
>wont name you all but I do hope you will share with us.
>
>   Thanks!
>   Misty
>
